subtitle: Trend overlay using ATR bands that flips on crosses.

measures.how_to_read: Price above Supertrend line implies bullish state; below implies bearish. Flips mark potential trend changes.
measures.caveats: Lagging and can whipsaw in chop; treat flips as context not guarantee.

step_by_step: Watch for flip + confirm with price action

assistant_hints: Treat flips as context; wait for candle close or retest before entries.
Tune ATR multiplier by timeframe/volatility to reduce whipsaws.
Combine with trend filters (EMA/MACD) for alignment.
Avoid relying on Supertrend alone in range-bound markets.
beginner_summary: Trend overlay using ATR bands that flips on crosses.
